name: Google Apps Script Kickstart for Firebase Studio
description: Jumpstart your Google Apps Script development on Firebase Studio with this collection of starter templates. Designed to boost productivity and ensure high-quality, maintainable code from day one.

options.apps-script-module-template: Kickstart your Apps Script project with a foundational modular structure (Crockford-style) for organized and maintainable code.
options.apps-script-script-engine-template: Kickstart your Google Apps Script projects with this robust, highly configurable template that includes essential development tools right out of the box.
options.apps-script-basic-starter-template: Kickstart your Apps Script journey with a minimal, bare-bones starter template, perfect for simple scripts or learning the basics.
